('/api/users/allusers').get: returns all user objects. Key: all_users
('/api/users/:username').get: returns the requested username object. Key: requested_user
('/api/bookreviews/:review_id').patch: allows you to upvote or downvote the review. Send object with review_id key and a vote key ('up'/'down')
('/api/bookreviews/:review_id/comments'): allows you to post a new comment to the specified review
returns the specified reviews comments. This also takes sort_by and order as queries
('/api/bookreviews').get: returns all book reviews. This also takes sort_by, order, username, and topic as queries
('/api/comments/:comment_id').patch: allows you to upvote or downvote the specified comment
('/api/comments/:comment_id'.delete: deletes the specified comment. If comment is successfully deleted will return error message 204.
